title: Bug 5473 ShiftLeft behavior with intermixed tabs and spaces
description: Bug 5473 ShiftLeft behavior with intermixed tabs and spaces Build 200110251.
OB: When the tab character is replaced with spaces in the first line, causing both lines to be visually indented the same, and ShiftLeft is executed, the text moves. It is unclear how this behavior is specified, but in the first scenario, it appears that the second line should be shifted left and the first line should be shifted left at least to the space character (i.e., the tab should be removed). In any case, if there is a stray space, it is confusing as the reason why the text won't shift is not clear.
